title: How to get new legend after April 24
body: How are we supposed to purchase new legends after April 24 with the new client? In the current 7.8 build of the new client, the button to purchase a legend is disabled and hovering over it says "Not implemented yet". Is there going to be a patch on April 24 to enable the button?

replies.body: You might be looking at your Collections, which isn't connected to the store yet.  Instead, select Store which is next to your RP/IP balance.  You'll be able to unlock content there.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Yes, I've always used Collections to view champs. Going through the Store allows me to buy champs with RP/IP. Thx.
